newsitem.title: USA: Iowa-So Minn hogs estimate Monday 100,000 - USDA.
newsitem.headline: Iowa-So Minn hogs estimate Monday 100,000 - USDA.

text.p: USDA estimated interior Iowa and southern Minnesota hog receipts were 100,000 head, compared with 100,000 a week ago and 93,000 a year ago, USDA said. Estimates include generally about 65 percent Carcass Base Hogs. Barrows and gilts were $1.00 per cwt higher than the midsession Friday. Trade was slow for good demand and light to moderate offerings.
Sows: 500 dn. steady to 1.00 higher, 500 up steady to 1.00 lower.

Note: Prices quoted represent sales of hogs averaging 73-74 pct. carcass yields with mostly 1.00-1.25 inches of last rib backfat and 47-48 pct. lean. Special considerations and grade premiums not reflected in base prices.
